old Package¶

websetup Module¶

Setup the old application

old.websetup.getLanguageObject(languageList)[source]¶

Given a list of ISO-639-3 language data, return an OLD language model.

old.websetup.getLanguageObjects(filename, config)[source]¶
old.websetup.setup_app(command, conf, vars)[source]¶

Place any commands to setup onlinelinguisticdatabase here
